creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: red, green, blue overall silk embroidery similar to chain stitch; three vertical designs separated by diamonds; thin braided strap at top ends with green and orange wool tassel and two white beads; embroidered through heavy brown cotton
